nodes.text: An invasion force of the Galactic Empire consisting of the Blood Ambition's ground complement was deployed during the Battle of Xorrn and commanded by the commanding officer of the vessel, Captain Ralchio Nervi and directly Lieutenant Colonel Erle Hovlinn. It consisted of two battalions of stormtroopers along with two All Terrain Scout Transports, speeder bikes, and at least one HAVr A9 Floating Fortress.
